SENSORS:

"userState.json" is generated by a user preference sensor which is an interface for user inputs
"energyState.json" is generated by an energy provider sensor
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MONITOR:

"contextModel.json" is generated by the Monitor

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ANALYZER:

The analyzer receives "contextModel.json" and applies an Event-Condition-Action ECA rule:
IF context values are different from yesterday, THEN pass "contextModel.json" to the planner
OTHERWISE pass "plan.json" from yesterday to the Executor

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PLANNER:

"plan.json" is generated by the Planner

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXECUTOR:

"concreteWfTree.json" is generated by the Executor and is passed to the 
parallel connector PAR from the SmartHome composite
